cells.data:
1，判断是否为空：isEmpty
1
2
3
4
var str:String = ""
if str.isEmpty{
    print("is empty")
}

2，获取字符数量：string.characters.count
1
2
let str = "hangge.com"
print("\(str.characters.count)个字符")

3，检查字符串是否有特定前缀/后缀：hasPrefix/hasSuffix
1
2
3
var str = "hangge.com"
if str.hasSuffix(".com"){
}

4，还可以用“\()”在字符串里包裹变量，常量
1
2
let name = "hangge.com"
let msg = "欢迎来到 \(name)"

5，大小写转换：
通过字符串的uppercaseString、lowercaseString、capitalizedString属性来访问一个字符串的大写/小写/首字母大写
1
2
3
4
5
let str = "Welecome to hangge.com"
         
let uppercase = str.uppercaseString  //WELECOME TO HANGGE.COM
let lowercase = str.lowercaseString  //welecome to hangge.com
let capitalized = str.capitalizedString  //Welecome To Hangge.Com

6，字符串截取
（1）将String转化为NSString再截取
1
2
3
4
5
let str = "Welecome to hangge.com"
         
let fromStr = (str as NSString).substringFromIndex(5) //ome to hangge.com
let toStr = (str as NSString).substringToIndex(5)  //Welec
let rangeStr =  (str as NSString).substringWithRange(NSMakeRange(4,1)) //c
（2）直接调用String的对应方法（推荐）
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
9
let str = "Welecome to hangge.com"
 
let index =  str.startIndex.advancedBy(5)
let index2 = str.endIndex.advancedBy(-5)
let range = Range<String.Index>(start: index, end: index2)
 
let fromStr = str.substringFromIndex(index)  //ome to hangge.com
let toStr = str.substringToIndex(index2)  //Welecome to hangg
let rangeStr = str.substringWithRange(range) //ome to hangg
